bio.title: shadowlerone
bio.text: Hey there. I'm shadowlerone (yes you can call me shadow or lerone). I'm currently a student of music and science in college and I want to pursue composition in university.

projects.title: what i do
projects.text: What I do is simple. I write and perform music. Jazz, classical, funk, I pull inspiration from everything around me. I'm currently working on the soundtrack for a game of mine as well as covering popular songs and video game tunes.
